des:
With the Goodman Connected Thermostat skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Goodman Connected thermostats by voice. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Goodman account and discover your thermostat(s). Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which thermostat to use.
* Use the name(s) you set up already – these are shown in the Goodman Connected Thermostat app and can be changed in settings on each thermostat.

Once you know the name of your thermostat, you can say the following: "Alexa, decrease the Upstairs by 3 degrees.", or "Alexa, set the Downstairs temperature to 72."

A list of more example phrases include:
